cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet. January 1950SECRET Copy No. 6CP. (50) 912th January, 1950CABINETELECTION BUSINESS committee note by the Prime MinisterAt every General Election since 1923 the Government in office have appointed a Cabinet Committee to supervise the work of advising Governmentcandidates about the replies which the)^ should return to questionnaires and other general enquiries put to them during the Election.I have accordingly appointed a Committee to carry out these duties,consisting of Lord President (in the Chair).Lord Privy Seal.Minister of Labour.Chief Whip.Lord Henderson.As some members of the Committee may be out of London from time totime, the Lord President may ask other Ministers to assist the Committee,when occasion requires.C. R. A.10 Downing Street, S.W. 1,12th January, 1950.38144
